<item>
<title>
<![CDATA[ About ]]>
</title>
<link>http://10.0.0.245/about/</link>
<pubDate>Sat, 05 Aug 2023 01:50:35 +0000</pubDate>
<dc:creator>
<![CDATA[ Chief3967 ]]>
</dc:creator>
<guid isPermaLink="false">http://lkr.ipd.mybluehost.me/about/</guid>
<description/>
<content:encoded>
<![CDATA[ <!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"medium"} --> <p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">The gap between technical jargon and business jargon is wide. Many technical gurus and security engineers have a hard time explaining why their proposed security solution is worth the cost to business executives. </p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center"} --> <p class="has-text-align-center"><strong>I'm here to help bridge that gap. </strong></p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:image {"align":"full","id":99,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} --> <figure class="wp-block-image alignfull size-large"><img src="http://10.0.0.245/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/signal-2023-08-11-150450_002-1024x577.png" alt="" class="wp-image-99"/></figure> <!-- /wp:image --> <!-- wp:spacer --> <div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div> <!-- /wp:spacer --> <!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"center","align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":"90px"}}} --> <div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-center"><!-- wp:column --> <div class="wp-block-column"></div> <!-- /wp:column --> <!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center"} --> <div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center"><!-- wp:paragraph --> <p>I'm an Army Veteran, incident response leader, father, and husband. I enjoy cyber security and the outdoors and everything in between.</p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --></div> <!-- /wp:column --> <!-- wp:column --> <div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":33,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} --> <figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="http://10.0.0.245/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/WordSplatter.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-33"/></figure> <!-- /wp:image --></div> <!-- /wp:column --> <!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center"} --> <div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center"></div> <!-- /wp:column --></div> <!-- /wp:columns --> <!-- wp:spacer --> <div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div> <!-- /wp:spacer --> <!-- wp:spacer --> <div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div> <!-- /wp:spacer --> <!-- wp:paragraph --> <p></p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:paragraph --> <p></p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} --> <div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div> <!-- /wp:spacer --> ]]>
</content:encoded>
<excerpt:encoded>
<![CDATA[ ]]>
</excerpt:encoded>

<content:encoded>
<![CDATA[ <!-- wp:template-part {"slug":"header","theme":"neve-fse","tagName":"header","lock":{"move":false,"remove":false}} /--> <!-- wp:group <p class="has-medium-font-size">The internet is dangerous, let us help protect what matters most</p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:buttons {"align":"wide","layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"left"}} --> <div class="wp-block-buttons alignwide"><!-- wp:button {"className":"is-style-fill"} --> <div class="wp-block-button {"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"64px","bottom":"64px","right":"24px","left":"24px"},"margin":{"top":"0px","bottom":"0px"}}},"backgroundColor":"ti-bg-alt","layout":{"type":"constrained"}} --> <div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-ti-bg-alt-background-color has-background" style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:64px;padding-right:24px;padding-bottom:64px;padding-left:24px"><!-- wp:columns {"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":{"top":"40px","left":"40px"}}}} --> <div class="wp-block-columns alignwide"><!-- wp:column {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","right":"0px","bottom":"0px","left":"0px"}}}} --> <div class="wp-block-column" {"style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":"0","padding":{"top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0"}}},"layout":{"type":"constrained","wideSize":"80px","justifyContent":"left","contentSize":"80px"}} --> <div class="wp-block-group" style="padding-top:0;padding-right:0;padding-bottom:0;padding-left:0"><!-- wp:image {"id":179,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} --> <figure class="wp-block-image {"textAlign":"left","level":3,"fontSize":"medium"} --> <h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size">Security Assessments</h3> <!-- /wp:heading --> <!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} --> <p class="has-text-align-left">The beginning block to better security. A review of current state and a plan to a more secure position.</p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --></div> <!-- /wp:column --> <!-- wp:column {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","right":"0px","bottom":"0px","left":"0px"}}}} --> <div class="wp-block-column"
